sn45.149:1.2: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakaraniya kammanta kariyanti, sabbe te pathavim nissaya pathaviyam patitthaya evamete balakaraniya kammanta kariyanti;
sn45.149:1.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silam nissaya sile patitthaya ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaroti.
sn45.149:1.4: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silam nissaya sile patitthaya ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaroti?
sn45.149:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …pe…
sn45.149:1.6: evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silam nissaya sile patitthaya ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikarotiti.
sn45.149:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakaraniya kammanta kariyanti, sabbe te pathavim nissaya pathaviyam patitthaya evamete balakaraniya kammanta kariyanti;
